question: W.B. Rao, who passed away recently, was the noted personality of which field?
explanation: W.B. Rao, the veteran Cinematographer has passed away in Mumbai, Maharashtra on January 16, 2018. Rao had been a part of the film industry for over four decades. He worked for films like \"Hum\", \"Khuda Gawah\", \"Rangeela \"Raja Hindustani\", \"Judwaa\", \"Har Dil Jo Pyar Karega\" and \"Dhadkan\". He worked with a range of actors from the late Sanjeev Kumar, Mala Sinha to Amitabh Bachchan, Salman Khan and Juhi Chawla.
